wybug_title: 一猫汽车网主站登录设置不当导致可撞库
wybug_corp: 北京一猫汽车科技有限公司
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-01-06：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-01-11：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 一猫汽车网主站登录设置不当导致可撞库 详细说明：  http://passport.emao.com/login/?backUrl=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.emao.com%2F#login_wrap没有验证码没有次数限制密码明文提交POST /docdlogin HTTP/1.1Host: passport.emao.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:43.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/43.0Accept: */*Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://passport.emao.com/login/?backUrl=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.emao.com%2FContent-Length: 106Cookie: BAIDU_DUP_lcr=http://wooyun.org/corps/%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%8C%AB%E6%B1%BD%E8%BD%A6%E7%A7%91%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8; Hm_lvt_c8553bf999297be4b7c3bf2ffec7c37f=1452005234; Hm_lpvt_c8553bf999297be4b7c3bf2ffec7c37f=1452006266; _ga=GA1.2.816849709.1452005234; city_id=1; city_name=%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC; province_id=1; homePageCityId=1; homePageCityName=%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC; homePageCityPinYin=beijing; city_pinYin=beijing; EMAOSSID=63iq3vvcs3g6jna9jkema70vd1; vacolide=oKqZpA%3D%3D; regcount2016010522=1; _jzqa=1.3467950360625069000.1452006254.1452006254.1452006254.1; _jzqb=1.2.10.1452006254.1; _jzqc=1; _jzqx=1.1452006254.1452006254.1.jzqsr=emao%2Ecom|jzqct=/.-; _jzqckmp=1; logintimes=YToyOntzOjE6ImMiO2k6MTI7czoxOiJ0IjtpOjE0NTIwMDYzNTE7fQ%3D%3DConnection: keep-aliveaccount=admin&pw=123456&loginType=1&rememberMe=0&backUrl=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.emao.com%2F&t=0.3407824696904006下图这些都是撞库成功的密码都是123456
